biotools.summary: PyUNIxMD is an object-oriented Python program for molecular dynamics simulations involving multiple electronic states. It is mainly for studying the nonadiabatic dynamics of excited molecules.

bioschemas.name: PyUNIxMD
bioschemas.summary: PyUNIxMD is an object-oriented Python program for molecular dynamics simulations involving multiple electronic states. It is mainly for studying the nonadiabatic dynamics of excited molecules.
